short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Workgrid Assistant: Conversational AI that guides employeesâ€™ attention to actions, info, tools, and knowledge, wherever they work.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Workgrid is a conversational AI platform that guides employees' attention to the moments that matter. Our AI Work Assistant consolidates information from various systems, documents, and knowledge bases. This enables employees to complete tasks and access information seamlessly through a user-friendly, conversational interface. The Assistant provides a personalized and engaging experience by simplifying work processes and delivering information to employees in the channels they work in most, reducing digital friction and enhancing the employee experience.
